channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sahel Crisis Goes Coastal as Insurgents Push Toward the Atlantic
item.description: Insurgents are expanding from West Africa’s Sahel region toward Atlantic coastal nations such as Ivory Coast, creating new terrorism hot spots and dis...

item.title: After early reprieve from immigration enforcement, farming industry reckons with raids
item.description: The Trump administration's immigration enforcement mostly left farms and meat packing plants alone, until coordinated raids last week. Now, President ...

item.title: Manhunt Ends for Minnesota Suspect, and Israel-Iran Conflict Ramps Up
Emergency alerts go out in Spanish and English, but what happens if you speak another language?
item.description: The FCC has delayed implementing its multilingual emergency alerts system — making non-English speakers vulnerable during climate disasters.

item.title: With No Clear Off-Ramp, Israel’s War With Iran May Last Weeks, Not Days
item.description: Israel and Iran both have little incentive to stop and no obvious route to outright victory. Much depends on President Trump.

item.title: Israel hits more Iranian military targets, Iran retaliates on fourth day of conflict
item.description: Trump said Sunday he remained optimistic about Israel and Iran reaching a deal, but added "sometimes they have to fight it out."

item.title: Mamdani and Blake Will Cross-Endorse in N.Y.C. Mayor’s Race
item.description: Zohran Mamdani, a front-runner in the New York City mayor’s race, will announce a second cross-endorsement with Michael Blake, a former state lawmaker...

item.title: North Koreans fighting for Russia against Ukraine have grown skilled in drone warfare
item.description: North Korea sent 11,000 elite soldiers to support Russia. Their progress — especially in drone warfare — has implications not only for Russia's war on...

item.title: Slain Minnesota Lawmaker Remembered as Pragmatic Problem Solver
item.description: Colleagues described Representative Melissa Hortman as a skilled, conciliatory lawmaker who was at once steely and warm.

item.title: Elon Musk may be gone but DOGE isn't done remaking the federal government

item.title: Live Updates: Israel Says It Attacked Headquarters of Powerful Iranian Military Unit
